alert.note: Alert for Spencer; Vanderburgh; Warrick (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 08 at 1:58PM EST until January 10 at 11:00PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky...Illinois...Indiana...Missouri... Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam. Ohio River at Mount Vernon. Ohio River at Cairo. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky...Illinois...Indiana... Ohio River at Shawneetown. Ohio River at J.T. Myers Dam. Ohio River at Newburgh Dam. .Heavy rain from last weekend and this weekend has contributed to rises on the Ohio River drainage basin this week, with minor flooding anticipated. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Newburgh Dam. * WHEN...Until late Monday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:00 PM CST Saturday the stage was 43.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Monday afternoon and continue falling to 28.3 feet Tuesday, January 18. - Flood stage is 38.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
